pages.text: Consumes a set of <l>(misc/crafting_material#labware)Labware</l> per 5 operations on average.
Can be used to copy genetic information between samples and templates.

pages.title: Copy Templates
pages.text: To copy <l>(misc/crafting_material#gene_template)templates</l>:<li>put the source template in the top left slot<li>put the destincation template in the left slot<li>destiantion template must be either empty or contain otther samples from the same organism

pages.title: Copy Samples
pages.text: To copy <l>(misc/crafting_material#gene_sample)gene samples</l>:<li>put the filled sample in the top left slot<li>put the blank sample in the left slot
